body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Planning     Wayside Exhibit Style Guide              Wayside Exhibit Style Guide          Download a PDF version of the Anza Trail Wayside Exhibit Style Guide (2014)  Wayside Exhibit templates in Adobe InDesign are available upon request.                    Examples of Anza Trail Wayside Exhibits   3 Photos  An assortment of interpretive wayside exhibits located along the Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail
title: Juan Bautista de Anza National Historic Trail: Wayside Exhibit Style Guide
